title: The Launchpad
subtitle: AI-Powered Chatbot & CRM Integration
description: An intelligent, self-service support system that boosts efficiency and enhances the customer experience through CRM-aware AI assistance.

details.challenge: Support team spending significant time on repetitive questions about order status, course prerequisites, and CEU rules, creating bottlenecks and slowing response times.
details.solution: Architected AI-powered chatbot integrated with WooCommerce, LearnDash, and FluentCRM via Cloudflare Workers for personalized, context-aware responses.

title: The Guardian
subtitle: Provider Directory & Analytics Dashboard
description: A data-driven dashboard that proves ROI and drives member retention through clear performance insights and benchmarking.

details.challenge: Provider directory members had no way of knowing if their listing was working, risking constant churn without ROI proof.
details.solution: Built custom analytics dashboard syncing GA4 API to display views, clicks, traffic sources, and benchmarks against peer averages.

title: The Compass
subtitle: GTM & GA4 Data Layer Revamp
description: Building a foundation of truth for accurate, data-driven marketing decisions through normalized event tracking and clean attribution.

details.challenge: Messy GTM container, legacy tags, and inconsistent event tracking made data unreliable, leading to wasted ad spend and poor attribution.
details.solution: Complete data layer revamp with normalized event schema and server-side PHP hooks for clean, reliable data flow to GTM and GA4.

title: The Fortress
subtitle: Edge Security Overhaul with Cloudflare
description: A proactive, multi-layered defense strategy that neutralized threats, reduced server load, and enhanced performance at the edge.
impact: 86% cache hit ratio, 85K+ malicious hits blocked monthly

details.challenge: High-traffic WordPress site under constant siege from bots, brute-force attacks, and scrapers causing server strain and security vulnerabilities.
details.solution: Comprehensive Cloudflare security implementation with WAF, rate limiting, Bot Fight Mode, and tiered caching for proactive edge-first defense.

title: The Conductor
subtitle: Events Hub & Instructor Tools
description: A unified administrative dashboard for data-driven event management and instructor empowerment with real-time insights.
impact: Time-to-insight reduced from hours to minutes

details.challenge: Events team and instructors lacked centralized, real-time view of event performance, making it difficult to identify at-risk courses and prepare effectively.
details.solution: Built unified Events Hub consolidating LearnDash, WooCommerce, and FluentCRM data with enrollment velocity indicators and detailed attendee breakdowns.

title: The Engine Room
subtitle: Training Lifecycle Automation
description: An end-to-end automated system that creates a seamless student journey from purchase to certification with zero manual intervention.
impact: Near-zero certificate delays, notable decrease in support tickets

details.challenge: Fragmented student journey requiring manual intervention between WooCommerce purchases, LearnDash enrollment, and CRM segmentation.
details.solution: Architected fully integrated automation pipeline connecting purchase → enrollment → evaluation → certification with automatic tagging and CRM updates.

title: The Closer
subtitle: Quote-to-Order System with Payment Plans
description: A seamless, automated system that reduces sales friction and unlocks new revenue opportunities through flexible payment options.
impact: Significantly increased close rate on phone orders

details.challenge: Manual phone-based sales process was clunky with high-value quotes stalling due to payment friction and lack of flexible options.
details.solution: Advanced quote-to-order system with Gravity Forms generating WooCommerce orders and Stripe integration for 3-18 month payment plans.

title: The Accelerator
subtitle: Edge Image Optimization Pipeline
description: AVIF/WebP at the edge for instant LCP wins on media-heavy pages through intelligent format negotiation and caching.

details.challenge: Large hero images and galleries crushing LCP and CLS metrics, with traditional plugin-based optimization insufficient for performance needs.
details.solution: Built edge worker for device-aware format negotiation (AVIF/WebP/JPEG), DPR-based resizing, and intelligent caching by device/locale.

title: The Safety Net
subtitle: CI/CD for WordPress
description: Versioned, testable deployments with instant rollback capabilities for reliable and confident WordPress releases.

details.challenge: Manual FTP deploys were risky and slow, with theme builds, plugin updates, and DB changes happening ad hoc, making recovery difficult.
details.solution: Set up GitHub Actions pipeline with asset building, smoke tests, health checks, rsync deployment, and automatic rollback on failure.

title: The Shield
subtitle: Enterprise-Grade Security Overhaul
description: Multi-layered defense-in-depth strategy protecting against brute-force attacks and malicious bots while maintaining platform stability.

details.challenge: Site under constant siege from brute-force attacks and malicious bots, inflating server load and threatening user data during critical campaigns.
details.solution: Architected comprehensive edge defense with Cloudflare WAF, origin hardening, encrypted tunnels, and DNSSEC implementation.

title: The Optimizer
subtitle: Full-Stack Performance Optimization
description: Comprehensive optimization addressing performance from server to browser with multi-tier caching and advanced compression.

details.challenge: Heavy pages and unoptimized assets causing slow load times, poor Core Web Vitals, and increased bounce rates hurting conversions.
details.solution: Engineered multi-tier caching system with payload reduction, CDN offloading, and orchestrated browser/LiteSpeed/Cloudflare caching layers.

title: The Analyst
subtitle: Unified Marketing Analytics Stack
description: Complete analytics rebuild creating single source of truth for conversion data and eliminating attribution drift.
impact: Significant improvement in marketing efficiency and ROAS

details.challenge: Fragmented and unreliable analytics leading to attribution drift, wasted ad spend, and inability to make confident data-driven decisions.
details.solution: Rebuilt entire measurement stack in GTM with legacy tag removal, GA4 consolidation, and standardized conversion events across touchpoints.

title: The Qualifier
subtitle: Intelligent Lead Conversion Tracking
description: Refined conversion model distinguishing high-value leads from low-intent inquiries for optimized ad spend allocation.
impact: Dramatically improved conversion accuracy and lead quality

details.challenge: Analytics treating all form submissions equally, causing Google Ads to waste budget on low-intent inquiries instead of marketing-qualified leads.
details.solution: Built custom PHP hook firing detailed events to dataLayer with GTM RegEx triggers filtering for high-value form IDs and MQL conversion actions.

title: The Navigator
subtitle: Dynamic & Interactive Event Maps
description: Modern interactive map experience replacing static event listings with visual discovery and filtering capabilities.
impact: Significant increase in user engagement and training signups

details.challenge: Static, text-heavy event directory frustrating for clinicians to navigate, leading to drop-off during discovery and lost registrations.
details.solution: Built interactive Google Maps experience with geocoded events, visual browsing by location/date/type, and seamless filtering logic.

title: The Stabilizer
subtitle: Backend Reliability & Server Tuning
description: Deep server-level optimization eliminating 503/504 errors and PHP memory exhaustion for stable operations.
impact: Critical backend errors eliminated, platform stability restored

details.challenge: Frequent 503/504 errors and PHP memory exhaustion crashing plugins during business hours and interrupting workflows.
details.solution: Conducted comprehensive server optimization with PHP-FPM tuning, Apache configuration, PHP 8.3 upgrade, and Netdata monitoring with alerts.
